statements: SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_name FROM supply_chain_information;
SELECT product_name, origin_country FROM supply_chain_information WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_information WHERE origin_country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM supply_chain_information WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT product_id, origin_country, blockchain_id FROM supply_chain_information ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, origin_country FROM supply_chain_information WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_information WHERE origin_country = 'USA' AND supplier_name = 'XYZ Co'
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, origin_country FROM supply_chain_information ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, origin_country, supplier_name FROM supply_chain_information WHERE origin_country = 'France'
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_name FROM supply_chain_information WHERE blockchain_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM product WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, origin_country FROM product WHERE manufacturer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_id, origin_country FROM product ORDER BY manufacturer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain WHERE delivery_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT shipment_id, product_id, shipper_name, delivery_date FROM supply_chain WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, origin_country FROM product WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT shipment_id, shipper_name, delivery_date FROM supply_chain WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT product_id, product_name, origin_country FROM product WHERE manufacturer_id = 2 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT shipper_name, delivery_status FROM supply_chain WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain;
SELECT product_name, origin_country FROM supply_chain WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, blockchain_hash FROM supply_chain WHERE origin_country = 'China';
SELECT manufacturer_name, expiry_date, price FROM product_details WHERE price <= 100.00 ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, action, user_id FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, origin_country FROM supply_chain WHERE origin_country = 'USA';

SELECT supply_chain.product_name, product_details.price, transaction_history.transaction_date FROM supply_chain JOIN product_details ON supply_chain.product_id = product_details.product_id JOIN transaction_history ON supply_chain.product_id = transaction_history.product_id WHERE transaction_history.action = 'SOLD' ORDER BY transaction_history.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, blockchain_hash FROM supply_chain WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT manufacturer_name, batch_number, expiry_date FROM product_details WHERE expiry_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC, batch_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_information;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, manufacturing_date FROM supply_chain_information WHERE origin_country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date, manufacturer FROM supply_chain_information WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer, origin_country FROM supply_chain_information ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM e_commerce_transactions WHERE buyer='Alice' AND seller='Bob';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, manufacturing_date FROM supply_chain_information;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, miner FROM blockchain_network WHERE miner = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, buyer, seller, transaction_date FROM e_commerce_transactions WHERE buyer = 'Bob' AND seller = 'Alice' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM product_reviews WHERE rating > 3 AND review_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, origin_country FROM supply_chain_information WHERE origin_country = 'USA' AND manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_products;
SELECT product_name, origin_country FROM supply_chain_products;
SELECT manufacturer_name, address FROM supply_chain_manufacturers;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_products ORDER BY product_id DESC;

SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, origin_country FROM supply_chain_products JOIN supply_chain_manufacturers ON supply_chain_products.manufacturer_id = supply_chain_manufacturers.manufacturer_id;
SELECT product_name, amount FROM supply_chain_products JOIN supply_chain_transactions ON supply_chain_products.product_id = supply_chain_transactions.product_id WHERE amount > 100;

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, region FROM supply_chain_transactions JOIN supply_chain_locations ON supply_chain_transactions.transaction_id = supply_chain_locations.location_id WHERE region = 'Asia';
SELECT block_hash, timestamp FROM supply_chain_blockchain WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
